OCSDNET » All Posts http://ocsdnet.org/forums/feed/ Thu, 08 Jan 2015 06:45:54 +0000 http://bbpress.org/?v=2.5.4-5380 en-US http://ocsdnet.org/forums/topic/what-role-for-open-and-collaborative-science-in-development/#post-105 <![CDATA[What role for open and collaborative science in development?]]> http://ocsdnet.org/forums/topic/what-role-for-open-and-collaborative-science-in-development/#post-105 Thu, 09 Oct 2014 13:51:24 +0000 OCSDNet Coordinators Share any ideas, evidence bases, even reservations on the role Open and Collaborative Science could be play in development in the Global South!

This space exists for us to discuss, share and learn from one another on what’s happening across the Global South, to increase visibility and enhance conversation, co-creation and collaboration.
